title: UPDATE_MAPDATA_ENTITY
content:
0xFC52CB91// UpdateMapdataEntity
void UPDATE_MAPDATA_ENTITY(int mapdata, int entity, object entityDef);Parameters:mapdata: A fwMapData index from GET_MAPDATA_FROM_HASH_KEY.entity: An entity index from GET_ENTITY_INDEX_FROM_MAPDATA.entityDef: The new entity definition in fwEntityDef format.Transiently updates the entity with the specified mapdata index and entity index.
This function supports SDK infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
codeBlocks:
